text: thæcring brrda phu thi pidbang sing sung pen swn hnung khxng khamphir thi xallxhˌ di thrng prathan lng ma læa na sing nan pi lækpeliyn kab rakha xan leknxy chn hela nan midi kin xari kheapi nı thxng khea phwk khea nxkcak fi theanan læa nı wan ki ya mahˌ xallxhˌ ca mi thrng phud kæ phwk khea læa ca mi thrng thahı phwk khea brisuththi læa phwk khea ca di rab kar lngthosʹ xan cebsæb
